title: Ever since the servers went down last night I have been unable to log in
body: I have tried everything in the "login error" support page and nothing has worked.  Had zero problems prior to the server problems last night.

replies.body: I'd like to help with this but need some more information.  Are you receiving any errors and what do they say?  Does the login screen appear at all?  What ISP are you using?  We've are also been investigating a report where some players were experiencing login problems this morning; though, it seems it's been resolved.  Our NOC technicians have also been collecting information such as traceroutes in the following [thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/B2VFcQKX-stuck-at-logging-in-after-maintenance).  Let me know!
Yeah it's centurylink.  I can get to login screen and type in my info.  It says logging in and then it just gives me a login error.
Welcome to the club, we meet..well today!

same for me all day 
whats going on? is there a fix coming?
Is your ISP Century Link bro...cause so far its been the same for most of us, in texas, iowa, kansas...and more Im sure

I'm in texas and I have Century Link as well and I can't log in either. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling, repairing the client, resyncing my clock..It does the normal Authenticating, then Logging In...And that's where it pauses, the animation doesn't freeze it just stays at "Logging in..." and then after maybe a couple minutes I get this error.

**Connection Error**

Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.

Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.
I'm having the same problem on Comcast in Michigan.
